name: Flux
tagline: Build your own agents in iMessage
description: AI doesnâ€™t have an intelligence problem - it has an interface problem. Flux is the first platform for building personalized conversational agents that live inside messaging platforms like iMessage and WhatsApp. By meeting users where they already communicate, Flux enables agents to feel less like software and more like people - trusted friends, tutors, or assistants. The future of AI isnâ€™t another app. Itâ€™s agents that interact with humans on an emotional level.

name: DaysAround
tagline: Track every country you've ever been to. Privately.
description: Resurface your favorite travel memories. Keep a beautiful log of where life has taken you. Get the data that matters â€” days per country for tax residency, visa warnings, Schengen limits. All from your iPhone photos, scanned locally. Nothing ever uploaded.

name: Ultracite v7
tagline: Opinionated, zero-config code linter and formatter
description: Ultracite is designed to help you and your AI models write consistent and type-safe code without the hassle of configuration. Trusted by top companies like Vercel, Clerk, and ElevenLabs. Get started in seconds. npx ultracite@latest init

name: Still
tagline: A private space to think, write, and slow down
description: Still is a minimal journaling app designed for people who feel overwhelmed by noise, productivity pressure, and endless feeds. Unlike traditional journaling apps, Still doesn't track streaks, moods, or goals. It gives you a private, calm space to write freely â€” for clarity, not performance. No accounts. No social features. No prompts telling you how to feel. Just you, your thoughts, and a moment of stillness.

name: Fluxer
tagline: Open-source Discord-like instant messaging & VoIP platform
description: An open-source, independent instant messaging and VoIP platform. Built for friends, groups, and communities.

name: NoteTabs
tagline: Native macOS text editor with horizontal tabs & auto-restore
description: Still missing the tabbed experience of Notepad++ on your Mac? Meet NoteTabs. We brought the 'horizontal tabs' and 'auto-save' magic to a native, minimalist macOS interface. No more window clutter, no more 'Save' button anxiety. Just open, write, and close. Your notes stay exactly where you left them. Fast, lightweight, and built for people who value speed over complexity. Zero friction, total focus

name: CalendarJet
tagline: AI scheduling with branded booking page your own domain
description: CalendarJet is the AI powered scheduling platform that gives you what Calendly charges $15,000/year for. Custom domains (book.yourbrand.com) for just $27. One time. Forever. Normally $497. Zero branding. Your logo only. Full customization like WeTransfer. AI that schedules by voice. Built for coaches, agencies, and founders tired of the subscription trap.

name: Notchification
tagline: Compilation and Claude progress bars in your mac's notch!
description: You're deep in code. A build kicks off. You switch tabs, check Slack, read docsâ€”then wonder: "Wait, is it still compiling?" Notchification ends the guessing. A sleek progress bar appears right in your MacBook's notch when builds are running. Glance up. Know instantly. Get back to work. Works with the tools you already use: - Xcode - Android Studio - Claude Code CLI

name: 8udget
tagline: Budget, invest & track finances - works offline
description: 8udget is a personal finance app that actually works offline - no internet required. Track your budget with category breakdowns, monitor stock & crypto investments in real-time, manage recurring bills with reminders, and set financial goals with progress tracking. Unlike other finance apps, your data stays on your device by default. Import messy bank statements with 80-90% accuracy. Available on iOS, Android, Web, Mac - all from one codebase built with Flutter + Rust. Free to start.

name: Rest Now - Screen Break Timer
tagline: Open source screen break timer for macOS
description: Rest Now is a lightweight screen break timer for macOS that helps reduce eye strain and mental fatigue during long screen sessions. Designed for macOS users who spend long hours coding, designing, studying, or working on a macbook. Key Features: Menu bar screen break timer, eye-friendly break reminders, minimal and distraction-free design, quietly runs in the background while you work. Rest your eyes. Reset your focus. Rest Now.

name: youtube-mcp-server
tagline: MCP server for YouTube video transcription and metadata.
description: A powerful Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for YouTube video transcription and metadata extraction.

name: Mnexium AI
tagline: Persistent, structured memory for AI Agents
description: Give your LLMs persistent memory. Mnexium stores, scores, and recalls long-term context with a simple API â€” no vector DBs, no pipelines, no retrieval logic. Add a single mnx object to your AI requests and get chat history, semantic recall, and durable user memory out of the box.

name: Overguide
tagline: Get real-time AI help without leaving your videogame.
description: Overguide is an AI-powered overlay that gives you instant help while you play. Overguide appears on top of your game and lets you ask anything, it understands whatâ€™s on your screen. Whether you need strategy tips, puzzle solutions or quick explanations, Overguide is your always-on gaming copilot. ðŸŽ® Smart in-game overlay for Windows & macOS âš¡ Global hotkeys â€“ ask anything instantly ðŸ§  Context-aware AI with screen understanding ðŸªŸ Transparent, lightweight & non-intrusive

name: docc2json
tagline: Turn Apple DocC output into a web-friendly SDK JSON schema
description: Apple DocC is great inside Xcode, but hard to reuse elsewhere. docc2json parses DocC JSON output and converts it into a clean, structured SDK schema optimized for web documentation sites, IDE tooling, and analysis.

name: FrickFrack
tagline: a minimalist social media experience
description: In a world of 4K perfection, FrickFrack celebrates the beauty of limitation. Every video you create is automatically transformed into a retro GameBoy-style masterpiece: 256x256 pixels, a nostalgic 4-color green palette, and that unmistakable lo-fi aesthetic that defined a generation. "Constraint Breeds Creativity." By limiting resolution, color, and duration, FrickFrack forces you to think differently. Every frame matters. Every movement counts. Ready to create something beautifully imperfect?

name: Tempo
tagline: Universal Music Tracker,Stats, Pretty Visual Journal & Story
description: Tempo tracks listening across 20+ Android music apps (Spotify, YouTube Music, local files) and unifies it into one timeline. Get "Wrapped-style" insights in real-time for any rangeâ€”today, week, month, all timeâ€”plus cinematic story cards built for sharing. All data stays local (no backend), with export/import and Google Drive backup. Connecting Spotify is optional and only for metadata. Deep stats include discovery dates, fan badges, engagement scores, moods, and listening personalities.

name: Stenox
tagline: Your voice, perfectly transcribed in every app & browser
description: Stenox is smart voice dictation for macOS. Dictate anywhereâ€”any app, any browser, any text field. Run smart transcription locally with Whisper and MLX, use popular cloud providers with your own API keys, or try Stenox Cloud. Speech is automatically cleaned upâ€”filler words removed, formatting applied. Add custom vocabulary for names and jargon. Create profiles that auto-switch based on your active app. Your data stays private,on-device, or per the api key's privacy policy.

name: Agihalo
tagline: LLM Router for A.I Agent & Saas with x402
description: LLM Router for AI Agents with X402 http://agihalo.com The inception of a decentralized agent organization begins with decentralizing the payment dependency of LLM models. Integrate the HALO router to allow AI Agents to break free from human fiat payment systems and autonomously handle LLM paymentsâ€”their potential life sourceâ€”on the X402 rail. Automate X402 payments easily with just one line of code. MAKE AGENT FREE

name: Amalga
tagline: Hire Smarter. Ramp Faster. Serve Better.
description: Most CX tools fix problems after customers feel them. Amalga prevents them. Amalga AI evaluates candidates before hire and coach agents before they go liveâ€”across conversation quality and pronunciation. Itâ€™s a shift from reactive QA to proactive readiness, built from firsthand experience in support and CX leadership.

name: BaoBrain v2
tagline: Prescriptive social listening for ecommerce
description: BaoBrain is now a Conversion Intelligence Platform. Instead of just "what happened," we answer "what should I fix first?" New Features: UX & Sales Detection: Pinpoints exactly where you lose customers. Social Listening: Monitors Reddit and reviews for sentiment. Prescriptive AI: Gives a descriptive fix list ranked by revenue impact. No messy dashboards. Just clear steps to grow your bottom line. Privacy-first, GDPR compliant, and setup takes minutes.
